title: Element of Crime - Immer Da wo Du bist bin ich nie flac
description:
Element Of Crime - Immer da wo du bist bin ich nie (2009) flac


Element of Crime is a German rock band 
that plays melancholic chanson-, pop- and rockmusic with guitar, 
bass, drums and voice/trumpet.

The band was founded in 1985 by Sven Regener 
who later became known as the author of the books â€œNeue Vahr SÃ¼dâ€ (2004), 
â€œDer kleine Bruderâ€ (2008) and â€œHerr Lehmannâ€ (2001) (â€œBerlin Bluesâ€) 
and as the screenplay writer of the film adaptation of â€œHerr Lehmannâ€. 
Regener sings and plays guitar, trumpet, accordion and piano. 
The band's name was borrowed from the title of the movie 
â€œThe Element of Crimeâ€ by Lars von Trier.

While various members of the band contributed music to the songs, 
Regener wrote most of the lyrics - 
in English for the first few albums and then in German.
